ing: 1 fluid ounce Tennessee whiskey (such as Jack Daniels Â®)
1 fluid ounce sweet and sour mix
des: "Named after the hometown of the Jack Daniels distillery, this refreshing mix of whiskey, lemon lime soda, triple sec, and sour mix is lemonade for grown-ups."
ins:
Combine whiskey, triple sec, and sweet and sour mix in a pint glass. Add ice and top with lemon lime soda.
Garnish with lemon wheel.
